text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide hl7.fhir.be.pss

PrescriptionSearchSupport

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/pss/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.be.pss

Example IG exercises many of the fields in a SUSHI configuration.

name: PrescriptionSearchSupport
title: Prescription Search Support
description: Example IG exercises many of the fields in a SUSHI configuration.

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

grouping.name: Logical Models
grouping.description: Data Models representing the data structures and requirements for interoperability.

grouping.name: PlanDefinitions (services)
grouping.description: PlanDefinitions defining the service endpoints for using the PSS. These have the inputs and outputs represented by the profiles

grouping.name: Resource Profiles
grouping.description: These define constraints on FHIR resources for systems conforming to this implementation guide

grouping.name: Extensions
grouping.description: These define additional elements that can be exchanged with the respective FHIR resources

resource.name: PSS Rating Extension
resource.description: A clinician-friendly rating, or score, for the recommendation; patient-friendly if the recommendation is patient-facing.

resource.name: PSS Relevant Patient Age
resource.description: The approximate, relevant age of the patient at the time of the search.

resource.name: PSS Request
resource.description: A request for PSS (Prescriber Support System) results.

resource.name: PSS Request Bundle
resource.description: The PSS Request Data Bundle is used to request data from the PSS system.

resource.name: PSS Response
resource.description: A response containing the results from the PSS.

resource.name: PSS Response Bundle
resource.description: The PSS Response Bundle is used to return data from the PSS system.

resource.name: PSS Response Communication Request
resource.description: All PSS responses contain a PSS Communication Request conformant to this profile.

resource.name: PSS Response Medication Request
resource.description: The PSS Response Medication Request is used when the PSS system returns a MedicationRequest

resource.name: PSS Response Request Group
resource.description: All PSS responses contain a PSS RequestGroup conformant to this profile.

resource.name: PSS Response Service Request
resource.description: The PSS Response Service Request is used when the PSS system returns a ServiceRequest

resource.name: PSS-QSI condition codes
resource.description: Condition codes from the QSI system

resource.name: PSS-QSI procedure codes
resource.description: Procedure codes from the QSI system
